| HistoryText             = The [[Schutz Heiligruppe]] pursued the [[Johann Shmidt (Earth-616)|Red Skull]] and his [[Skeleton Crew]] in an attempt to have him tried for war crimes.  The group was stopped by [[Arnim Zola (Earth-616)|Arnim Zola]]'s duplicates of Thor, Iron Man and Captain America.

After realizing the dupe, Vormund continued his pursuit, running into [[Captain America (Steve Rogers)|Captain America]]. The two worked together until learning that Schmidt had been apparently killed by [[Scourge]]. 

The team was later was assigned to investigate the murder of several superheroes in [[South America]]. [[Larry Ekler (Earth-616)|Zeitgeist]] (AKA Everyman) was revealed as the killer after slaying [[Franz Mittelstaedt (Earth-616)|Blitzkrieg]]. Zeitgeist attempted to kill Vormund; Vormund used his powers to redirect Everyman's sword, killing him.
